attributes.action: Reconsider Proposals to Build on Green Belt land In and around Reigate and Banstead District
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Apparently Reigate and Banstead need to find land to build another 11,240 homes and the only way to do this is to expand in to the green belt, it should not be allowed.  We all live her because we like the surroundings.  Someone has to make a stand.
